File Translations

This method allows you to import translations from an Excel worksheet to our string translation system. Please ask details from us if you plan to use this!

Method: GET/POST

URL: https://transfluent.com/v2/file/translations/

Parameters:

callback_url

format [=UTF-8]

content

type

save_only_data

identifier

language

token

Returns:

with status OK: 

{"status":"OK","response":{"identifier":"Localizable.strings","source_language":{"name":"English","code":"en-gb","id":1},"target_languages":{"3":{"name":"Finnish","code":"fi-fi","id":11}},"status":{"11":{"progress":"1.82%","word_count":549,"word_count_translated":10}}}} OR (depending on type) {"status":"OK","response":true}
